title: CTRL0000083776 - Transcribed Interview of John Matze, (May 25, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Zoom, commencing at 2:05 p.m.
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
We can go on the record at 2:05 p.m.
This is a deposition of John Matze conducted by the House Select Committee to
Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol pursuant to House
At this time, Mr. Matze, can you please state your full name and spell your last
John Edward Gerard Matze, and the last name is spelled
At this time, Mr. Matze, can you please raise your right hand to be sworn by the
Thank you for the pronunciation, too.
Do you solemnly declare and affirm under the penalty of perjury

So this is going to be a staff-led deposition, although members of the select

we are starting the deposition there are no members in the Zoom, although some may
